name: QR Code Generator 4 All
author: Internetloesungen.com

sections.description:
With our free plugin QR Code Generator 4 All we give all website owners the ability to integrate a comfortable
QR code generator in your website with a shortcode snippet. So you provide your customers a real added value.

QR Codes (Quick Response Codes) are coded graphics, that can be read by current smartphones
and tablets with the appropriate software. They form a bridge between the real and the virtual world.
Nowadays it’s hard to find advertisements without this code. With one scan you are directed to a website,
a product video or a download link in the App Store. Receive immediately information or the content you
want without having to type a link. Complete Business cards are imported within seconds.
Even pre-formulated, pre-addressed mail and SMS as well as free text messages can be transmitted.
With the enormous range of practical applications QR Codes are continuously gaining importance.

The plugin provides the following features:

  • Easy installation and integration
  • Generates QR Codes for business cards, links, SMS, free text, phone numbers and emails
  • Custom-QR-Codes including your logo
  • Intuitive operation
  • Professional design
  • Colors, spacing and fonts are customizable
  • Multilingual. Both the user interface and the configuration page in the administration area are available in the following languages​​: German, English, Dutch and Japanese. Own translations can be added easily.
  • Shortcodes for dynamically generated QR Codes on your webpages

Languages

  • English
  • German
  • Dutch
  • Japanese
  • Italian
  • Easy to translate into other languages. Translation instructions

"QR Code" is a registered trademark of DENSO WAVE INCORPORATED.
sections.installation:
1. Click “Install Now” in search results row
  2. Click “OK” to accept plugin installation
  3. Once installed, click the link “Activate Plugin”
  4. Go to Settings->QR Generator 4 All. Here you can create QR Codes and learn how to integrate them.
sections.faq:
Can I use the codes commercially

Yes, private and commercial use and printing are allowed.
sections.changelog:
2.0.0

  • QR codes with image are now free.

1.0.10

  • Added new language: italian.

1.0.8

  • Fixed business card creation bug.

1.0.7

  • Fixed problem with Explorer < 9.
  • Fixed business card creation.

1.0.6

  • Disable Custom-QR-Codes if required curl extension is missing.

1.0.5

  • Faster recovery after error with site token.

1.0.4

  • Added content-length for generated images.

1.0.3

  • Update on text change added.

1.0.2

  • Initial version.

short_description: Create and embed QR Code images, offer QR generator to your user. Can also render Custom-QR-Codes with included logo.
